Queensland 275 (Burns 171, Webster 4-50) and 7 for 310 (Khawaja 115*, Labuschagne 78) beat Tasmania 332 (Jewell 140, Doggett 4-88) and 252 (Doran 55, Silk 51, Bartlett 4-59) by three wickets
Usman K… [+2312 chars]
